definition[0]: a type of golf club (=stick), used to hit the ball a short distance towards or into the hole
definition[1]: to spend time doing things that are not very important in a relaxed way
example[0]: I puttered around for a while, cleaning up the kitchen.
definition[2]: to walk or move slowly and without hurrying
example[1]: A little boy puttered along the sidewalk.
definition[3]: to make the low sound that a vehicle makes when it is moving slowly
